Question: Wheel.me AS CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Wheel.me AS

Genius 2 Autonomous Wheel

- Autonomous wheels with load, size, and routes customization
- Immediate return on investment
- Low-maintenance with simple troubleshooting
- Fast setup and enhanced safety
- Navigation algorithms for dynamic and static obstacle detection
- App control via desktop, tablet, or mobile
- Dedicated charging stations with automatic level monitoring
- Sensor fusion using IMU, depth camera, and LiDAR
- Mecanum (omnidirectional) wheels for quick repair
- Seamless 5G and Wi-Fi cloud connection
- Scalable and flexible for any use case
- Premium service with support packages and warranty coverage
- 4-wheel Genius 2 starting at USD 13,990
- 8-wheel Genius 2 starting at USD 19,990
- Premium service starting at USD 900 per year
Summary_cn:
Wheel.me AS

Genius 2自主车轮

- 具有负载、尺寸和路线定制的自主轮
- 即时回报投资
- 低维护成本，故障排除简单
- 快速设置和加强安全性
- 导航算法用于动态和静态障碍物检测
- 可通过桌面、平板电脑或手机应用程序控制
- 配备自动水平监测的专用充电站
- 使用IMU、深度摄像头和激光雷达的传感器融合
- 配备Mecanum（全向）轮以便进行快速维修
- 无缝5G和Wi-Fi云连接
- 可扩展且灵活适用于任何使用场景
- 提供支持套餐和保修服务
- 4轮Genius 2起售价为13,990美元
- 8轮Genius 2起售价为19,990美元
- 起价为900美元每年的高级服务
